FuncDef: The display eth-trunk membership command displays information about member interfaces of an Eth-Trunk interface. The display eth-trunk membership command displays information about member interfaces of an Eth-Trunk interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an Eth-Trunk interface.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 1023.

ExtraInfo: After an Eth-Trunk interface is successfully configured, you can run the command to view the configuration of the Eth-Trunk interface and its member interfaces.
